languages.text:
This creature spends all its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains the following effects until the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This unit spends all his AP and gains buff until the end of his next turn:
- whenever his attack hits target must succeed a Toughness check 40 or become proned
- damage of this unit cannot be lowered below 50%

traits.locale_text:
This creature spends all their AP and gains the following effects until the end of their next turn:
-<indent=5%>Targets hit by this creature must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −40 penalty or fall {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Damage dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

languages.text:
Существо тратит все свои {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} получает следующие эффекты:
-<indent=5%>Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от этого существа, совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g}, наносимый этим существом, нельзя уменьшить более чем на 50%.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature spends all its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains the following effects until the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Существо тратит все свои {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} получает следующие эффекты:
-<indent=5%>Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от этого существа, совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g}, наносимый этим существом, нельзя уменьшить более чем на 50%.</indent>

Существо тратит все свои {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и до конца своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} получает следующие эффекты:
-<indent=5%>Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от этого существа, совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −40 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Урон{/g}, наносимый этим существом, нельзя уменьшить более чем на 50%.</indent>

languages.text:
La criatura gasta todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y gana los siguientes efectos hasta el final de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por esta criatura deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por esta criatura no se puede reducir por debajo del 50 %.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature spends all its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains the following effects until the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
La criatura gasta todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y gana los siguientes efectos hasta el final de su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por esta criatura deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −40 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido por esta criatura no se puede reducir por debajo del 50 %.</indent>

languages.text:
この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}をすべて使用して、自分の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、次の効果を獲得する：
-<indent=5%>この生き物に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されたターゲットは、−40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>この生物によって与えられた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、50%以下にはならない。</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature spends all its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains the following effects until the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}をすべて使用して、自分の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで、次の効果を獲得する：
-<indent=5%>この生き物に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}されたターゲットは、−40の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>この生物によって与えられた{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}は、50%以下にはならない。</indent>

languages.text:
此生物消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，获得以下效果，持续至此生物的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束：
- <indent=5%>被此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。</indent>
- <indent=5%>此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会被降至50%以下。</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature spends all its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains the following effects until the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
此生物消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，获得以下效果，持续至此生物的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束：
- <indent=5%>被此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-40{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。</indent>
- <indent=5%>此生物造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会被降至50%以下。</indent>

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur verbraucht ihre gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und erhält bis zum Ende ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} folgende Effekte:
-<indent=5%>Von dieser Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -40 belegt oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Von dieser Kreatur verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} kann nicht unter 50 % gesenkt werden.</indent>
languages.original_text:
This creature spends all its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains the following effects until the end of its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this creature must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Diese Kreatur verbraucht ihre gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und erhält bis zum Ende ihres nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} folgende Effekte:
-<indent=5%>Von dieser Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} Ziele werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -40 belegt oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Von dieser Kreatur verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} kann nicht unter 50 % gesenkt werden.</indent>

languages.text:
Cette créature dépense tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} pour gagner les effets suivants jusqu'à la fin de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} :
-<indent=5%>Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par cette créature doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −40. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par cette créature ne peuvent pas être réduits de plus de 50 %.</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} dealt by this creature cannot be reduced below 50%.</indent>

En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par cette créature ne peuvent pas être réduits de plus de 50 %.</indent>
